::Darkfate/Chamaleon::

Darkfate stoppen and suddenly he used his commlink and 
saID "Chanaleon, turn off alarms and prepare the brigde"

"Yes sir" answered a voice.

The dragon walked again and soon he lead towards a tunnel, a red 
light was shinning there and everybody could feel the heat.

"Welcome to Dragon's Lair" said one of snake head to Dribillt, 
Killfest and their followers.
